alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:36PM CDT until May 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Gage County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Endicott, or 8 miles south of Fairbury, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Endicott and Steele City around 750 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Diller and Harbine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
